data.name: ReadDocument
data.value: select top(1) T1.NAME, T1.DESCRIPTION, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_DOCUMENT T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OUTGOING_DOC T2 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE = T2.DOC_EFFECTIVE_DTE) and (T1.NAME = T2.DOC_NAME) and (@infId = T2.INF_ID)

data.name: ReadInfrastructure
data.value: select top(1) SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, PROCESS_STATUS, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT_DETAIL_NAME, DENORM_NUMERIC_12, CASE_NUMBER, CSE_PERSON_NUM, CASE_UNIT_NUM, USER_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, [FUNCTION] from CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE with(readuncommitted) where SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = @systemGeneratedI

data.name: ReadLegalAction1
data.value: select top(1) T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId) and (T2.IDENTIFIER = T1.TRB_ID) and (T1.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) on (T3.LOCATION = T2.FIP_LOCATION) and (T3.COUNTY = T2.FIP_COUNTY) and (T3.[STATE] = T2.FIP_STATE) and (T3.STATE_ABBREVIATION = @stateAbbreviation) and (T3.COUNTY_ABBR = @countyAbbr)

data.name: ReadLegalAction2
data.value: select top(1) T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_FIPS_TRIB_ADDR T3 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId) and (T1.TRB_ID = T3.TRB_ID) and (T1.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) and (T3.COUNTRY = @country)

data.name: ReadLegalAction3
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, COURT_CASE_NO, TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION with(readuncommitted) where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadMonitoredDocumentInfrastructure1
data.value: select distinct T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE, T1.ACT_RESP_DT, T1.CLOSURE_REASON_COD, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.INF_ID, T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, T2.CSE_PERSON_NUM, T2.USER_ID from CKT_PRN_OUTPT_DEST T4 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OUTGOING_DOC T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_MONITORED_DOC T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T3.INF_ID = T1.INF_ID) and (T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE >= @requiredResponse) and (T1.ACT_RESP_DT = @actRespDt) on (T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = T3.INF_ID) and (T2.USER_ID = @userId) and (T2.CSE_PERSON_NUM = @csePersonNum) and (T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I >= @systemGeneratedI) on (T4.PRINTER_ID = T3.POD_PRINTER_ID) and (T4.OFF_GENERATED = @offGenerated) order by T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP

data.name: ReadMonitoredDocumentInfrastructure2
data.value: select distinct T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE, T1.ACT_RESP_DT, T1.CLOSURE_REASON_COD, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.INF_ID, T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, T2.CSE_PERSON_NUM, T2.USER_ID from CKT_PRN_OUTPT_DEST T4 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE T2 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_OUTGOING_DOC T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_MONITORED_DOC T1 with(readuncommitted) on (T3.INF_ID = T1.INF_ID) and (T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE >= @requiredResponse) on (T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = T3.INF_ID) and (T2.USER_ID = @userId) and (T2.CSE_PERSON_NUM = @csePersonNum) and (T2.SYSTEM_GENERATED_I >= @systemGeneratedI) on (T4.PRINTER_ID = T3.POD_PRINTER_ID) and (T4.OFF_GENERATED = @offGenerated) order by T1.REQUIRED_RESPONSE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP
